pr_title: Allow to set multiple system access controls in test

timeline.bodyText:
Commit message:
Previously state regarding SystemAccessControl objects was split between two fields: systemAccessControlLoading and
systemAccessControls. Sometimes systemAccessControlLoading was set while systemAccessControls was not.
timeline.author: losipiuk

timeline.message:
Use single variable to maintain the state

Previously state regarding SystemAccessControl objects was split between
two fields: systemAccessControlLoading and systemAccessControls.
Sometimes systemAccessControlLoading was set while
systemAccessControls was not.
Allow to set multiple system access controls in test
Allow to set multiple system access controls in test
